attributes.action: Slow down the Mortgage rate increases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In just one year my monthly mortgage rate has now risen by £300. The get out fee to change our mortgage provider will be over 1/3rd of our yearly income. The government needs to stop these ridiculous rises in bank rates and help us. If you can understand, or know someone in this situation of this financial dilemma, please sign.
